name: Berry 5000 - fruit crush
description:
This is a match-3 puzzle game with fresh scenes and vivid music!
Just pass those challenging levels with your amazing brain and a little luck!
Multi modes are waiting for you!
Have a try!
Features:
-collect items to gain the highest score
-easy and funny gameplay
-ranking list
- a variety of juicy fruits
-totally free
- Beat your friends on leaderboard

See who will be the 1st place on the ranking list!
